title: 3 Must-Know Tips Before Buying Homesteading Property!

subtasks: Evaluate local resources and community (access to feed, agricultural support)
Assess property condition (soil test, water source, potential infrastructure issues)
Consider topography and potential challenges (rocky terrain, drainage)
Verify soil test results and understand implications
Confirm infrastructure setup (well water, electrical hooks)
Confirm amenities and community support (ag extensions, feed stores)
(This might not count as tasks but for context) LT: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C_wRXr5ay9Q
